title: Person Of Interest - Pompano Acid [EDR002]
author: Thijn
comment: Its really hard to find gems like this. Its so beautiful <3 and that synth reminded me of some Aphex Twin tracks

YES PLEASE!!!   I thank Kornel Kovacs Rinse FM set for blessing me with this....

Such a nice tune; i'm addicted... and i don't normally like the acid sound but this taps into something else!!
description:
Person Of Interest - Pompano Acid [EDR002]

South Florida's very own J. Albert and Person of Interest come together for Exotic Dance Records on this four-track 12" of certified heat! B2 Person of Interest's homegrown "Pompano Acid" trades melodious acid with sun-soaked oscillating piano stabs on top of a shuffled boom-bap garage rhythm. 

Available for sale now at your favourite online record stores.
